title: TUESDAY 3/23 - Aaron Rodgers' future in Green Bay
itunes:title: TUESDAY 3/23 - Aaron Rodgers' future in Green Bay
description:
The Packers looking to restructure Aaron Rodgers' contract (0:06), but what does that mean for his future in Green Bay? Rob Gronkowski's future in Tampa set for at least one more season and he thinks the Bucs offense can improve on last season (1:30). Hunter Henry looking to replicate what Gronk did in New England. Henry talked about his relationship with his new head coach (2:17). And, Patrick Peterson now with the Vikings and he hopes to play at least another 5 seasons (3:11)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
